scripts.postinstall: node dist/install src --workspaces --omit=optional && node dist/install pkgs --workspaces && node dist/install dist --workspaces
scripts.dist: bash ./test/lint/check-src.sh && cd src && npm run dist
scripts.version: npm run version:src && npm run version:pkgs && npm run version:dist && npm run dist && npm i && git add .
scripts.release: gh workflow run release.yml -f dryrun=false -f version=patch
